name: Froglite
description:
Froglite is a procedurally generated roguelite where you can traverse an infinite number of rooms, fighting enemies and collecting better gear. There are currently five different world-types, each with different enemies and world generation methods.

Permadeath: Death erases your progress, inventory, and money. However, any new spells and world-types you unlock will stay unlocked.

Source code for the game can be found here. Not all assets are included in the repository, however.

Planned:

  • Actual sound effects
  • Graphical improvements
  • More gear, items, and spells
  • More world types
  • More varied appearances between world types
  • New useful NPCs

I have only tested the built application on Windows. I have built for Linux, but am not yet sure it runs.
